ticket.title: [TEST] Inverse of doesn't work when associations eager load other associations
ticket.original-body:
Using includes when loading an association that has an inverse_of causes the inverse_of not to work.
@@@ ruby p = Project.find(1) pi = p.project_items pi[0].project # Doesn't perform a query
p = Project.find(1) pi = p.project_items.includes(:image) pi[0].project # Performs a query @@@
I've attached a failing test case for Rails master.

ticket.original-body-html:
Using includes when loading an association that has an inverse_of causes the inverse_of not to work.

p = Project.find(1)
pi = p.project_items
pi[0].project # Doesn't perform a query

p = Project.find(1)
pi = p.project_items.includes(:image)
pi[0].project # Performs a query

I've attached a failing test case for Rails master.
